dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.workflows
Interface IWorkflowDescription

public interface IWorkflowDescription

This class defines the interface for all registered workflows.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
10

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Returns the optional workflow description, or null if the workflow has no desciption.
 org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image getIcon()
          Returns the optional workflow icon, or null if there is none
 java.lang.String getId()
          Returns the id of the workflow
 java.lang.String getLabel()
          Returns the label, which is shown in the selection dialog
 float getVersion()
          Returns the float version of the workflow
 boolean isAvailable()
          Returns if the workflow is available for the current selection.
 void show(APIOperationStatus status)
          Shows the workflow in the workflow view.
